mdRecord.dcterms:title: Passing of the Third Floor Back by Jerome K. Jerome
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Playbill for Passing of the Third Floor Back by Jerome K. Jerome. Directed by Margaret Perry. Setting and Costumes by Virginia Johnston. Lighting by Edmund Lynch. 1950-1951.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Theater
Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:rights: The original object is the property of the Barter Theatre in Abingdon, VA (https://www.bartertheatre.com/). This digital surrogate is made publicly available by the Barter Theatre for use in research, teaching, private study, and other educational purposes.
